thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Injury rules out Ghana winger Christian Atsu from Canada friendly
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: Injury rules out Ghana winger Christian Atsu from Canada friendly

title: EXCLUSIVE: Injury rules out Ghana winger Christian Atsu from Canada friendly
text:
Sports News | 7 October 2015 21:55 CET EXCLUSIVE: Injury rules out Ghana winger Christian Atsu from Canada friendly - www.ghanasoccernet.com Christian Atsu 
Winger Christian Atsu will not play in Ghana's international friendly against Canada next week due to injury, GHANAsoccernet.com can exclusively reveal. 
The 23-year-old suffered a knock during a training session with newly-promoted English side Bournemouth this week. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
